title: Tried to join normal game - DC'd  due to live maintenance then warned about leaving?
body:
So I queued for a normal game, got through champ select then bam game crashes due to firewall affecting something even though I have no firewall even installed. Notice the live maintenance status and then relog and a dialogue box pops up saying type I agree not to leave anymore games.

I wouldn't have left if you didn't DC me riot. Bunch of kents

EADC

replies.body: exact same thing happened to me.. In ranked Loss prevented pls and thx ^_^
